TopicTitle: Star Wars: The Clone Wars Season 7

Articles.Content:
Clone Wars is back for another season!

The show was cancelled with two seasons left unmade. I don't about you guys, but this is really exciting to me. 

What are your thoughts?
I really enjoyed the first couple seasons, then it got a bit boring and I stopped watching. It's on Netflix, I should go back and try it again.
I have a good feeling about this.

9 hours ago, 5thHorseman said:

I really enjoyed the first couple seasons, then it got a bit boring and I stopped watching. It's on Netflix, I should go back and try it again.

I heard somewhere that the watch order on Netflix is messed up. That kind of thing happens a lot to shows.

4 hours ago, Bill Phil said:

I heard somewhere that the watch order on Netflix is messed up. That kind of thing happens a lot to shows.

I'll keep an eye out for it, though I've never had that problem with other shows.

I was watching some unfinished episodes on youtube and I found that the shot where the gunship flies into a hangar in the cliff (where anakin, rex, and the other person are standing), is the exact same one used in the new trailer. I'm thinking that all they are doing is just finishing the unfinished episodes, and rebranding it as a new season. Won't fool me!

14 minutes ago, The_Cat_In_Space said:

I was watching some unfinished episodes on youtube and I found that the shot where the gunship flies into a hangar in the cliff (where anakin, rex, and the other person are standing), is the exact same one used in the new trailer. I'm thinking that all they are doing is just finishing the unfinished episodes, and rebranding it as a new season. Won't fool me!

Still would be great. They were unfinished after all.
I want to see this series go right up to the opening scene of ROTS.
